definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: These amount to 5 percent against 1990 levels over the period from 2008 to 2012.The first phase of the protocol ends in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 該議定書的第一階段於2012年結束。

sentences.english: Those rights, as individual rights, can give rise to claims under the first Optional Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 可以據此根據第一項《任擇議定書》提出的申請。

sentences.english: He must be too afraid to tell me what happened.
sentences.chinese: 他議定書太害怕了所以纔不敢告訴我真囘相。

sentences.english: Chlorofluorocarbons were regulated under the Montreal Protocol starting in 1987.
sentences.chinese: 根據蒙特利爾議定書規定氯氟烴在1987年開始。

sentences.english: Developing protocols to better coordinate response operations in a third country.
sentences.chinese: 制定更好地在第三國協調應對行動的議定書草案。

sentences.english: The US plan, if approved, could replace the existing Kyoto protocol.
sentences.chinese: 如果美國的計劃被通過，那它將代替京都議定書。

sentences.english: US petition drive towards ratifying the Kyoto Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 推進美國簽署京都議定書的請願書。

sentences.english: We disobey social protocol that stifles and stigmatizes personal freedom.
sentences.chinese: 我們服從社會和議定書，扼殺個人自由的烙印。

sentences.english: The Director General shall register this Act with the Secretariat of the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 總幹事應將本議定書交聯合國祕書處登記。

sentences.english: We are going to over-achieve our Kyoto targets.
sentences.chinese: 我們將超越京都議定書的目標。

sentences.english: Every reference to the present Protocol constitutes at the same time a reference to the Annex.
sentences.chinese: 在提到本議定書的同時也就包括附則在內。

sentences.english: Both sides say the UAE will forego enrichment and sign the protocol.
sentences.chinese: 雙方宣稱阿聯酋將放棄鈾濃縮並簽署該議定書。

sentences.english: The International Bureau shall register immediately the marks filed in accordance with Article 2.
sentences.chinese: 國際局應立即註冊依照本議定書第二條申請的商標。

sentences.english: The additional protocol is the  embodiment of those lessons.
sentences.chinese: 附加議定書是汲取這些教訓的體現。

sentences.english: The foundation of the Protocol is fairness.
sentences.chinese: 該議定書的根本是公平。
